document.title: Writing ASP.NET pages in Eiffel
document.paragraph:
EiffelASP.NET allows running ASP.NET pages written in Eiffel. It should be installed both the web server and on the ASP.NET page developer's machine. This documentation includes the following sections:
installation.xml Installation
describes the steps involved in installing EiffelASP.NET.
getting_started.xml Getting started
lists resources that will help getting started with EiffelASP.NET.
using_eiffel.xml Using Eiffel
lists a few points that are specific to using Eiffel for writting ASP.NET pages.
names_mapping.xml Names mapping
explains how to retrieve Eiffel identifiers from .NET ones.
